trans-unit.source: Abstract base class to be implemented by all text to speech synthesis engines.
trans-unit.target: Classe base astratta per essere implementata da tutti i motori di sintesi di sintesi vocale.

trans-unit.source: To construct a custom text to speech engine, an application must always implement a class derived from the abstract base class TtsEngineSsml.
trans-unit.target: Per creare un modulo personalizzato sintesi vocale, un'applicazione deve sempre implementare una classe derivata dalla classe base astratta TtsEngineSsml.

trans-unit.source: A properly registered implementation of TtsEngineSsml can then be used as a `Synthesizer``Voice` by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space based applications.
trans-unit.target: È quindi utilizzabile un'implementazione di TtsEngineSsml correttamente registrata come un `Synthesizer``Voice` da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>applicazioni basate sullo spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: Objects inheriting from TtsEngineSsml must override the following members: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti che ereditano da TtsEngineSsml deve eseguire l'override dei membri seguenti: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most important member of the TtsEngineSsml class to be implemented is the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il membro più importante della classe TtsEngineSsml da implementare è il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method is called by the infrastructures text parser receiving: 1.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>metodo viene chiamato dal parser testo infrastrutture ricezione: 1.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface, which provides access to system services such as even queuing and writing audio output.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>interfaccia, che fornisce l'accesso ai servizi di sistema, ad esempio anche l'accodamento dei messaggi e la scrittura dell'output audio.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance produced from Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) input.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>istanza generato da un input vocale sintesi Markup Language (SSML).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: In addition to text to be rendered as speech, the parsing of the SSML stores information about the requested attributes of the speech in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance associated with each incoming <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> object.
trans-unit.target: Oltre a testo da sottoporre a rendering come riconoscimento vocale, l'analisi dell'elemento SSML archivia informazioni sugli attributi richiesti del contenuto vocale in un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>istanza associata a ogni ingresso <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>

trans-unit.source: A speech synthesizer application can optionally make requests for a specified output format by implementing <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> to be called by the platform when it tries to provide the correct audio output.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione di sintetizzatore vocale può facoltativamente effettuare richieste per un formato di output specificato mediante l'implementazione <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>chiamata dalla piattaforma durante il tentativo di fornire output audio corretto.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: An implementer can also provide support for managing external definitions of pronunciations, or lexicons, by their implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Un responsabile dell'implementazione può anche fornire il supporto per la gestione di definizioni esterne di pronunce o dizionari, loro implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> based on an appropriate Voice Token registry key.
trans-unit.target: Costruisce una nuova istanza della <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> in base a una chiave del Registro di sistema vocale Token appropriata.

trans-unit.source: Full name of the registry key for the Voice Token associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Nome completo della chiave del Registro di sistema per il Token vocale associati il <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> implementazione.

trans-unit.source: engine.
trans-unit.target: motore.

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""></xref> implemented by the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un dizionario per la <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""> </xref> implementate dall'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Un dizionario di pronuncia è una raccolta di parole o frasi con le pronunce specificati utilizzando un alfabeto pronuncia appropriato.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called by the platform infrastructure in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling AddLexicon and using the `Synthesizer``Voice` implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene in genere chiamato dall'infrastruttura della piattaforma in risposta a un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>applicazioni chiamando AddLexicon e utilizzando il `Synthesizer``Voice` implementate dall'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>istanza.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: The value of `mediaType` is typically a MIME specification, as the SSML specification uses MIME for media specifications.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di `mediaType` è in genere una specifica MIME, la specifica SSML utilizza MIME per le specifiche dei supporti.

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""></xref> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza valida di <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""> </xref> che indica la posizione delle informazioni di lessico.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il tipo di supporto di lessico.

trans-unit.source: Media types are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Tipi di supporto sono tra maiuscole e minuscole.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface used to interact with the platform infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento a un <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> interfaccia utilizzata per interagire con l'infrastruttura della piattaforma.

trans-unit.source: Returns the best matching audio output supported by a given synthesize engine response to a request to the synthesizer engine for the support of a particular output format.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la migliore corrispondenza output audio supportati da una risposta di motore synthesize specificato a una richiesta al motore di sintetizzatore per il supporto di un determinato formato di output.

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `targetWaveFormat` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI, and the returned value should be allocated using `CoTaskMemAlloc`.
trans-unit.target: La struttura utilizzata come `targetWaveFormat` e restituito dalla deve compatibile con il metodo di `WAVEFORMATEX` disponibile in SAPI, e il valore restituito deve essere allocato utilizzando `CoTaskMemAlloc`.

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to: ``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```
trans-unit.target: Il `struct` deve fornire funzionalità equivalente a:``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```

trans-unit.source: Valid member of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat"></xref> enumeration indicating the type of requested audio output format.
trans-unit.target: Un membro valido del <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat"> </xref> enumerazione che indica il tipo di formato di output audio richiesto.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""></xref> containing detail setting for the audio format type requested by the `speakOutputFormat` argument.
trans-unit.target: Un puntatore a un <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""> </xref> contenente l'impostazione di dettagli per il tipo di formato audio richiesto dal `speakOutputFormat` argomento.

trans-unit.source: Returns a valid <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> instance referring to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""></xref> containing detailed information about the output format.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto valido <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> istanza che fa riferimento a un <xref uid="langword_csharp_struct" name="struct" href=""> </xref> che contiene informazioni dettagliate sul formato di output.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon currently loaded by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""></xref> implemented by the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un lessico attualmente caricato dal <xref uid="langword_csharp_Synthesizer" name="Synthesizer" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Voice" name="Voice" href=""> </xref> implementate dall'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Un dizionario di pronuncia è una raccolta di parole o frasi con le pronunce specificati utilizzando un alfabeto pronuncia appropriato.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> and using the `Synthesizer``Voice` implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato in genere in risposta a un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>basato su applicazioni che chiamano <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>e l'utilizzo di `Synthesizer``Voice` implementate dall'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>istanza.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""></xref> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza valida di <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Uri" name="System.Uri" href=""> </xref> che indica la posizione delle informazioni di lessico.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento a un <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> interfaccia passato in base all'infrastruttura della piattaforma per consentire l'accesso alle risorse di infrastruttura.

trans-unit.source: Renders specified <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> array in the specified output format.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering specificato <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> matrice nel formato di output specificato.

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `waveHeader` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI.
trans-unit.target: La struttura utilizzata come `waveHeader` e restituito dalla deve compatibile con il metodo di `WAVEFORMATEX` disponibile in SAPI.

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to: ``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```
trans-unit.target: Il `struct` deve fornire funzionalità equivalente a:``` internal struct WaveFormat { public Int16 FormatTag; public Int16 Channels; public int SamplesPerSec; public int AvgBytesPerSec; public Int16 BlockAlign; public Int16 BitsPerSample; public Int16 Size; } ```

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> instances containing the text to be rendered into speech.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> istanze che contiene il testo da sottoporre a rendering nel riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> pointing to a structure containing audio output format.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> che punta a una struttura contenente il formato di output audio.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"></xref> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento a un <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite"> </xref> interfaccia passato in base all'infrastruttura della piattaforma per consentire l'accesso alle risorse di infrastruttura.
